column4: Hello All... FireFox is asking for the java runtime plugin... Isn't that installed by default in ubuntu?
that's not a question :)  Try mplayer
read your /msg if you don't want to break your box
ok, what happens now when you try to start firefox?
open up a terminal and type 'firefox', what does it say?
are your intentions to revert to firefox 1.07 or to complete the upgrade to 1.5?
ok, what does the '/opt/firefox/firefox' command do then?
ok, run >>  dpkg-divert --list '*firefox*'  << and put it up on pastebin please, then give me a link ( http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/ )
does it work now?  (we should clean up a typo you made in diverting)
